attributes.action: Make it legal to overtake in any lane on a motorway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How to clog up a busy Motorway? Have someone in the fast lane doing 55. It's crazy - the fast lane is backed up, the slow lane is empty. At a stroke you would increase capacity on the Motorways, and reduce the frustration of the majority. It works OK in the States.
